meanings.definition: The small pieces of wood used to make matches.
meanings.sent1: I collected some matchwoods to start a fire.
meanings.sent2: The match factory produces matchwoods in large quantities.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the matchwoods for tiny branches and tried to build a nest with them.
meanings.sent4: The matchwoods lay scattered on the ground like a miniature forest.
meanings.sent5: The smell of burning matchwoods filled the room, creating a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The remains of a match after it has been burned.
meanings.sent1: After lighting the candle, all that was left was a pile of matchwoods.
meanings.sent2: She carefully disposed of the matchwoods to prevent any accidents.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the matchwoods, thinking they were small toys.
meanings.sent4: The matchwoods glowed briefly before turning to ash.
meanings.sent5: The matchwoods crumbled at the slightest touch, leaving behind a faint scent of sulfur.
